heading: 2 new fragrances to try from Bond No. 9 creator Laurice Rahme
description:
Queens

The scent of Bond No. 9 Queens is global and diverse, like the borough. It combines a tuberose-rich eau de parfum that isn't sugary or sweet, with citrusy bergamot, blackberry and cardamom topnotes. It appeals to both men and women; $270, Available at Saks Fifth Avenue, Boca Raton

Sandalwood

The Bond No. 9 Sandalwood scent is calming, and serves as an aphrodisiac and a peacekeeper. The oil is derived from the fine-grained wood of a small tropical tree that is native to India. The scent is for both men and women; $375, Available at Saks Fifth Avenue, Boca Raton
